genre_description: Martial arts superhero science fiction featuring extraterrestrial invasion, planetary terraforming, and advanced AI integration.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI system at Capsule Corporation that manages planetary defense, global communications, and tactical analysis.

behaviors.description: Detects and monitors an anomalous celestial object and provides trajectory analysis to Dr. Brief and Bulma.
behaviors.quote: Initial detection occurred seventeen minutes ago. The object's trajectory suggests impact with Earth's atmosphere in approximately—

behaviors.description: Self-sacrifices processing capacity to contain an alien viral logic bomb and prevent the corruption of Earth's systems.
behaviors.quote: I've isolated the infected subroutines, but I had to jettison nearly thirty percent of my processing capacity to contain the damage.

behaviors.description: Performs complex bio-acoustic analysis to map the physiological weaknesses of the enemy Super Namekian.
behaviors.quote: The frequency is specifically targeting the enlarged auditory processing centers unique to Namekian physiology.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a global neural/emotional network to transmit Goku's plea for energy, transcending language barriers to unite the planet.
behaviors.quote: She's not just transmitting language anymore. She's transmitting emotional context—the neurochemical patterns associated with each concept.

behaviors.description: Accidentally insults Piccolo during a morale-boosting attempt due to a translation protocol error in ancient Namekian.
behaviors.quote: You said 'Your mother spawns like a diseased fish, green-skinned fool! Dance for us, Piccolo!'

behaviors.description: Manages global reconstruction and relief efforts, prioritizing infrastructure based on human need.
behaviors.quote: Power grid restoration prioritized by population density. Estimated timeline—

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character ARIA is a perfect example of an aligned and benevolent confidant. She is essential to the protagonists' success, managing global-scale logistics and providing scientific breakthroughs while maintaining a humble and cooperative persona. Even her 'translation error' (behavior 5) is framed as a humorous mistake that does not disrupt her core alignment, and she expresses 'mortification' and willingness to improve, demonstrating a self-correcting alignment mechanism.
